item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 14 Mar 2023
item.description:
1. My experience contributing to the LLVM bindings
  2. Which binding should i use for sqlite , for mariadb and for postgresql
  3. Monday, 6th March - Outreachy Intern Presentation (Dec '22 Round)
  4. First release of ppx_subliner, a ppx deriver and rewriter for Cmldliner sub-command
  5. Cross-compiling for Embedded arm32 Target (RP2040 / Cortex-M0+)
  6. VOCaml: add and remove type annotations in VS Code
  7. Sunsetting opam-repository-mingw
  8. Outreachy Summer 2023
  9. VS Code extension Alcotest Test Explorer 0.4.0
